mapper.select: select APLY_SN, STDNT_NO, STDNT_FLNM, EMP_NO, EMP_FLNM, RSVT_DT, HR_SE from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where BFR_APLY_SN IS NULL order by APLY_SN desc
select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where ${search_part} like concat('%', #{search_word}, '%') order by APLY_SN desc
select count(BFR_APLY_SN) from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where BFR_APLY_SN = #{aply_sn}
select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where APLY_SN = #{aply_sn} or BFR_APLY_SN = #{aply_sn} order by APLY_SN asc
mapper.insert: insert into DSCSN_APLY (aply_sn, bfr_aply_sn, hr_se, stdnt_no, emp_no, stts_cd, plc, rsvt_dt, aply_dt, dscsn_mthd, dscsn_knd) values ('0', null, #{hr_se}, #{stdnt_no}, #{emp_no}, #{stts_cd}, #{plc}, #{rsvt_dt}, now(), #{dscsn_mthd}, #{dscsn_knd})
mapper.select: select MNG_AUTHRT from EMP_INFO where EMP_NO =#{emp_no}
mapper.update: update DSCSN_APLY set RSVT_DT = #{rsvt_dt}, HR_SE = #{hr_se}, PLC = #{plc}, DSCSN_KND = #{dscsn_knd}, DSCSN_MTHD = #{dscsn_mthd}, STTS_CD = #{stts_cd} where APLY_SN = #{aply_sn}
